# Chapter 5: RStudio Basics: R as a Calculator & Data Handling in R

## Learning Objectives

After studying this chapter you should be able to:

-   Become familiar with writing programs in R and RStudio
-   Become familiar with basic programming terminology and concepts
-   Be capable users of the R, RStudio, and RMarkdown statistical package
-   Become familiar with importing and exporting various data files in the R environment
-   Summarize data in R
-   Become familiar with calculation in R and creating variables
-   Develop different types of objects and data in R
